title: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding.
description: Bug 101187: Localization key can't be blank when adding. Description: If key is blank, externalized text can't be displayed in chart. Steps to reproduce: 1. <<User actions go here>>.
OB: When adding a localization key with a blank value, the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
EB: In the properties file, when adding a localization key with a blank value, it should still be externalized and displayed in the chart title.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Open the properties file. 2. Add a localization key with a blank value. 3. Verify that the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title.
